title: Who is the Estimating service for?
paragraph: Our Estimating service is designed for professionals in the construction industry, including general contractors, subcontractors, and estimators. It helps streamline the process of calculating project costs, ensuring accurate and efficient bids.

title: What features does the Estimating service offer?
paragraph: Our Estimating service includes tools for creating detailed cost estimates, managing material quantities, and analyzing project budgets. You can generate precise quotes, track changes, and collaborate with your team seamlessly.

title: Are there any additional fees?
paragraph: No hidden fees. The cost of the Estimating service is outlined in our pricing plans. You only pay for the package you select without any additional charges.

title: What plan and payment options are available?
paragraph: We offer several pricing plans tailored to different needs, from basic to advanced. Payment options include monthly or annual subscriptions. For detailed pricing and to choose the best plan for your needs, please visit our Pricing page.

title: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan at any time?
paragraph: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time to better fit your evolving needs. Simply contact our support team to adjust yourÂ subscription.
